preConditions.sqlCheck: select (count(actualAttlist.ATTACHMENT_LIST_ID) - prevAttlist.TOT - simpleResource.TOT - campaignFolder.TOT - testCaseFolder.TOT - project.TOT) from KEYVAL simpleResource, KEYVAL campaignFolder, KEYVAL testCaseFolder , KEYVAL project, KEYVAL prevAttlist, ATTACHMENT_LIST actualAttlist where prevAttlist.NAME = 'ATTLIST' and simpleResource.NAME = 'SR' and campaignFolder.NAME = 'CF' and testCaseFolder.NAME = 'TCF' and project.NAME = 'PROJECT' ;
